column6: Not as vibrant as in the picture
column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2021
column14: I was expecting a vibrant & bright pink & orange, but the colors are much darker than I expected. The pink is more burgundy & the orange is more of a warm nude. They're still very pretty & pigmented so I will use them. They just aren't exactly what I was looking for. One thing I really like is that the liquid lipstick component pops out completely so you don't have to carry the whole case.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2021
column14: I mainly bought this because I'm a sucker for nice packaging, but this packaging—while being cute—also adds portability. I don't have to worry about the cap of a lipstick tube accidentally falling off in my pocket or anything. The matte colours are great, too.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2022
column14: My first impression is that it feels a bit cheap like a child’s toy. It’s very light weight when I swatches it on my hands the colors bleed easily and looks very the same. Not bad for the price and cute packaging. It will definitely transfer onto anything touching it. Feels more like a lip stain. After scrubbing my hands with soap it left a pretty ugly red stain :(

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2022
column14: The lipsticks are up side down. When you try to pull them out the lipstick is stuck in the bottom of the container and not in the tube. You cant get them out and you wasted your money ..Buyer beware

column6: Really pretty but the color is slightly off
column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2021
column14: I really love these. They are very matte and feel nice on the lips. My only issue is that they are slightly different than the advantages colors. The lighter shade of the one I ordered (blend and green packaging) is more orange and a bit lighter than in the image. I would still recommend though!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2022
column14: Surprisingly long lasting, very pretty shades. Small tubes are good for travel. Use lip balm bc they are matte colors. Would buy again.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2022
column14: The packaging is super cute but it's a little hard to open. The colors aren't the same, still cute but not as advertised. It is not long-lasting or water proof at all. Nice lip feel, not drying.

column6: Great stain power but Cosme damaged lipstick was out of tube broken
column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2022
